ComicInfo.Title: Girl Talk with Lisa and Valerie; I Need a Drink!; Meet the Folks!; The Daily Routine
ComicInfo.Summary:
Girl Talk with Lisa and Valerie: The ladies talk about alternate terms for vagina.
I Need a Drink!: The Goon wakes up late due to his drinking, gets fired from his job while on the phone and then goes to an Alcoholics Anonymous meeting.
Meet the Folks!: Buddy is back in New Jersey and undecided if he's going to stay. He meets with his mother, his sister, his hospitalized father, goes to a weekend party and then finally decides he's staying for good.
The Daily Routine: A twelve-panel sequence showing Junior doing all the routine tasks, and at least one not-so-routine one.
